dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, com.opa334.ccsupport, preferenceloader, me.conorthedev.libappearancecell, applist, ws.hbang.common

descriptionlist.description:
MissionControl adds power modules, four applications, battery, network, storage, iCleaner module and more to the control room.
After installation, click Activate in the tweak settings.
